member.remarks: The match must either be an exact match of the individual flag (if ExecuteExactMatch is called) or match one of the flags passed in to ExecuteFlagsMatches.
member.param: The value to match (see remarks)
The method to execute on a successful match

member.name: M:Diagonactic.ParameterizedEnumDelegateMap`3.AssignToExactValue(`0,System.Func`3{`0,`1,`2})
member.summary: Assigns the to a match
member.remarks: The match must either be an exact match (if ExecuteExactMatch is called) or match one of the flags passed in to ExecuteFlagsMatches. If the value contains more than one flag, it will only execute if the call matches the flags exactly or a call to ExecuteFlagsMatches contains at least the flags provided.
member.param: The value to match (see remarks)
The method to execute on a successful match
